name: Egg Drop (MaverickGaming)
description:
Eggdrop

 

A Game About Parenting.

 

Object: Throw your egg to your partner as many times as you can. Score big points while learning good parenting skills. Don’t drop your egg. Despite what the title tells you to do.

To play the game, you must first install Love2d.  Be sure to hold shift to hold the egg; you'll throw it as soon as shift is released.   Have fun!

 

Controls

AWSD: movement

SPACE: jump

SHIFT: catch and hold egg

Number keys: cheat modes

Co-developed by Spencer Edgers, Erik VanHorn, and Travis (Takedown) Lastname
